landing.pending.title: Public page pending
landing.pending.description: This cover is displayed only when no landing page has been published from the Page Builder. Sign in as Admin or Teacher Admin to create a page, publish it and set it as the home entry. Once published, visitors will exclusively see that custom content.
landing.pending.tip: Tip: from Branding → Public hero you can adjust colors and logo before publishing.

whatsapp.assignment.summary: Hi! I need help with my assignments in :course. Pending: :pending, Sent: :submitted, Approved: :approved, Rejected: :rejected.

Track completion, quizzes and attendance: Track completion, quizzes and attendance in real time.
Adjust the visual identity in real time. Colors, typography and border radius synchronize instantly across the platform.
Use rem, em or px units (example: 0.75re: Use rem, em or px units (example: 0.75rem).
Typography responds to the selected font: Typography responds to the selected font stacks. Rounded corners match the global radius token.
Tweak the palette to align with your aca: Tweak the palette to align with your academy branding. Changes propagate through Tailwind tokens and CSS variables.
Here is your academy pulse for today.
Track enrollment, completion and engagem: Track enrollment, completion and engagement in real time. Your theme settings apply instantly to every widget.
Students enrolled in ongoing programs ac: Students enrolled in ongoing programs across all campuses.
Cohorts reaching the certification miles: Cohorts reaching the certification milestone this month.
Classes, master sessions and tutoring ro: Classes, master sessions and tutoring rooms streaming with realtime analytics.
Average post-lesson rating from surveys: Average post-lesson rating from surveys synced via MailerLite and Discord bots.
Top-performing learning paths with engag: Top-performing learning paths with engagement indicators.
Drag and drop chapters, configure lesson: Drag and drop chapters, configure lesson metadata and enforce progression rules. Changes persist automatically and apply to the bilingual player.
Draft the lesson content, Markdown suppo: Draft the lesson content, Markdown supported...
No lessons in this chapter yet.
Create the first chapter to unlock lesso: Create the first chapter to unlock lesson-level controls, prerequisites and localized content settings.

Continue watching to keep analytics and: Continue watching to keep analytics and gamification in sync for your students.
Resume at :time to avoid losing strict-m: Resume at :time to avoid losing strict-mode validation.
Analytics sync every 5 seconds (Pusher f: Analytics sync every 5 seconds (Pusher fallback to polling if needed).
Strict mode prevents skipping ahead beyo: Strict mode prevents skipping ahead beyond the last validated second. Toggle fallback from the Integrations panel if debugging is required.
Configure this lesson resource from the: Configure this lesson resource from the builder.
Text, PDF and iframe resources inherit y: Text, PDF and iframe resources inherit your theme tokens. Combine them with quizzes to unlock badges and MailerLite automations.
Actualiza tokens, toggles de modo gratui: Update tokens, free-mode toggles and OAuth credentials without touching .env. Changes apply instantly and stay in sync with the integrations panel.
Se requiere para el SSO de estudiantes y: Required for student and staff SSO.
Necesario para la comunicación en tiempo: Needed for realtime communication between the backend and the frontend.
Almacenamiento de archivos y datos estát: Storage for files and static assets.
Integración con servicios de video como: Integration with video services such as Vimeo and Cloudflare Stream.
Integraciones con servicios de mensajerí: Integrations with messaging services, spreadsheets and webhooks.
Forzar el uso de almacenamiento local o: Force local storage or local realtime modes, and YouTube-only playback.
Sincroniza campañas y listas de audienci: Sync campaigns and audience lists to automate nurturing flows.
Mide conversiones con Google Analytics 4: Track conversions with Google Analytics 4 and block spam with reCAPTCHA v3.
Observabilidad en tiempo real y canal di: Realtime observability and a direct channel for academic support.
Configura tu cuenta administrativa, cone: Set up your admin account, connect critical integrations and choose your default payment gateway.
Este usuario tendrá control total de la: This user will control the entire platform and invite other team members.
Ya existe un administrador. Si deseas cr: An administrator already exists. You can create another later from the dashboard.
Puedes dejar las credenciales en blanco: You can leave credentials empty to use the free mode and complete them later from the admin panel.
YouTube works as the free fallback. Fill the other credentials to enable premium providers.
Activa los toggles gratuitos para trabaj: Use the free toggles to work locally while you prepare S3/Pusher credentials.
Configura PayPal como pasarela principal: Configure PayPal as the default gateway. Later you can enable Stripe or custom methods from the admin panel.
Puedes registrar un enlace externo o ins: You can register an external link or instructions for alternative payments (transfer, crypto, etc.).
Completa la informacion para guardar cam: Complete the information to save changes instantly.
Explica los beneficios principales del t: Explain the main benefits of the tier.
Define quien accede a cursos premium, co: Decide who accesses premium courses, configure pricing and group cohorts from one dashboard.
Aun no hay tiers configurados. Crea el p: No tiers configured yet. Create the first one to get started.
No puedes eliminar un tier con estudiant: You cannot delete a tier with active students or subscriptions.
No puedes eliminar el tier predeterminad: You cannot delete the default tier.
Descripcion corta para dashboards y card: Short description for dashboards and cards
Describe objetivo, dinamicas o materiale: Describe goals, dynamics or materials of the cohort.
No puedes eliminar un grupo con estudian: You cannot delete a group with assigned students.
Define la informacion clave del grupo y: Set the key group info and its link to tiers.
Organiza cohortes, alinea estudiantes co: Organize cohorts, align students with tiers, and control each group capacity.
Filtra por nombre o correo y marca quien: Filter by name or email and mark who should belong to this cohort.
Aun no hay grupos configurados. Crea el: No groups configured yet. Create the first one to get started.
Debes iniciar sesion para comprar acceso: You must log in to purchase access.
No hay cursos configurados en el catalog: No courses configured in the catalogue.
Descubre contenido gratuito y premium. C: Find free and premium content. Simulated purchases update your tiers instantly.
You already have this tier active.
Contacta soporte para habilitar este cur: Contact support to unlock this course.
Ejecuta compras simuladas para pruebas o: Run simulated purchases for testing or support and inspect the latest events.

This dashboard adapts to your role.
El bloque superior muestra métricas gene: The top block shows general metrics and integration status.
El Playbook te ayuda a validar credencia: The Playbook helps validate credentials before each deploy.
Los paneles inferiores agrupan WhatsApp,: The lower panels group WhatsApp, XP, certificates and outbox.
Añade tus datos para personalizar recome: Add your details to personalize recommendations, certificates and reminders.
Nombres y apellidos tal como aparecerán: Names as they will appear on certificates.

País, región y ciudad para personalizar: Country, region and city to personalize your plan.
Experiencia, idiomas y especialidades mo: Experience, languages and specialties shown to students.
Haz clic en los hitos para centrar el ti: Click on the milestones to center the timeline on that chapter.

Let your teacher know to enable the ques: Let your teacher know to enable the questions.
Answer all questions. The system grades: Answer all questions. The system grades automatically and records your attempt.

Verifica los packs y el método de pago a: Verify the packs and payment method before finishing.
Validaremos el comprobante antes de acti: We will verify the receipt before activating the packs.
Si necesitas factura o tienes una solici: If you need an invoice or have a special request, write it here.
Al confirmar autorizas el cargo indicado: By confirming you authorize the indicated charge and you will receive your packs immediately.
